fields.label: Adding Projects and Learning Opportunities
fields.message: These will auto-populate in this page from the Projects menu and the Learning Opportunities in the sidebar. To add new items you can do so within those sections of the backend. The order of the items on the front-end will be randomized, while the size of the item can be selected when editing the specific item.

fields.label: Custom anchor
fields.name: custom_anchor
fields.instructions: Feel free to enter text either with spaces or hyphens. This field will automatically remove spaces etc, so something like "My Custom Anchor" would be converted to "my-custom-anchor".

fields.label: Thumbnail image
fields.name: thumbnail_image
fields.instructions: This will be used on the homepage.

fields.label: Embed
fields.name: embed
fields.instructions: This will only appear on the Learning Opportunities page. If no Embed is added, the Thumbnail Image will be used instead.
